name: Summer Music Festival
description: Join us for an unforgettable day of live music, fun, and celebration at the annual Summer Music Festival!

name: Artisan Craft Fair
description: Discover a world of creativity at the Artisan Craft Fair! This charming event brings together local artists, craftsmen, and artisans to showcase their handmade treasures.

name: Summer Wellness Retreat
description: Relax, recharge, and rejuvenate at our Summer Wellness Retreat, where you'll embark on a transformative journey towards inner harmony and well-being.
location: Tranquil Haven Retreat Center, Boulder, Colorado

name: Food Truck Festival
description: Indulge in a culinary delight at the Food Truck Festival! Experience a diverse selection of mouthwatering cuisines from various food trucks.

name: Film Under the Stars
description: Enjoy an evening of cinematic magic at Film Under the Stars. Grab your blankets and snacks for an outdoor movie screening under the open sky.

name: Art Exhibition Opening
description: Celebrate the vibrant world of art at the Art Exhibition Opening. Discover captivating artworks by talented local artists.

name: Sports Charity Run
description: Run for a cause at the Sports Charity Run. Join fellow enthusiasts in a fun-filled race while raising funds for a charitable organization.
